verses.roman:
janamejayas tasya putro
mahāśālo mahāmanāḥ
uśīnaras titikṣuś ca
mahāmanasa ātmajau

synonyms: janamejayaḥ—Janamejaya; tasya—of him (Janamejaya); putraḥ—a son; mahāśālaḥ—Mahāśāla; mahāmanāḥ—(from Mahāśāla) a son named Mahāmanā; uśīnaraḥ—Uśīnara; titikṣuḥ—Titikṣu; ca—and; mahāmanasaḥ—from Mahāmanā; ātmajau—two sons.
translation: From Sṛñjaya came a son named Janamejaya. From Janamejaya came Mahāśāla; from Mahāśāla, Mahāmanā; and from Mahāmanā two sons, named Uśīnara and Titikṣu.
